faqs.q: How many calories in a Penn Station 6-inch sub?
faqs.a: About 510 kcal for a standard grilled chicken sub.

faqs.q: What are the macros for Penn Station subs?
faqs.a: Typically 36 g protein, 18 g fat, 48 g carbs per 6-inch chicken sub.

faqs.q: Are Penn Station subs high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 1200 mg sodium per 6-inch sub due to cheese, mayo, and roll.

faqs.q: Calories in Penn Station steak sub?
faqs.a: Similar to chicken; a 6-inch steak sub is about 590 kcal.

faqs.q: How to lower calories in Penn Station orders?
faqs.a: Opt for no mayo, wheat roll, or half portions to reduce by 100-200 kcal.
